member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY
member.summary: Specifies the category of an audio stream.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_ForegroundOnlyMedia
member.summary: Media that will only stream when the app is in the foreground. This enumeration value has been deprecated. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_BackgroundCapableMedia
member.summary: Media that can be streamed when the app is in the background. This enumeration value has been deprecated. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_Communications
member.summary: Real-time communications, such as VOIP or chat.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_GameChat
member.summary: Game chat audio. Similar to AudioCategory_Communications except that AudioCategory_GameChat will not attenuate other streams.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_Movie
member.summary: Stream that includes audio with dialog.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_Media
member.summary: Stream that includes audio without dialog.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_FarFieldSpeech
member.summary: Media is audio captured with the intent of capturing voice sources located in the ‘far field’. (Far away from the microphone.)

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_UniformSpeech
member.summary: Media is captured audio that requires consistent speech processing for the captured audio stream across all Windows devices. Used by applications that process speech data using machine learning algorithms.

member.name: AUDIO_STREAM_CATEGORY.AudioCategory_VoiceTyping
member.summary: Media is audio captured with the intent of enabling dictation or typing by voice.
